mapper.sql: id, name, industry, work_type, score, content_type, remark, operator, operate_time, operate_ip
mapper.insert:
insert into exam_train_material
id,
name,
industry,
work_type,
score,
content_type,
remark,
operator,
operate_time,
operate_ip,
picture,
content,

mapper.update:
update exam_train_material
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=REAL},
content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_train_material set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=REAL}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_train_material set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=REAL}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.name as industry_name FROM (SELECT a.*,b.name as work_type_name FROM exam_train_material as a LEFT JOIN sys_work_type as b on a.work_type=b.id WHERE a.content_type = #{contentType} limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize})as a LEFT JOIN sys_industry as b on a.industry=b.id

SELECT a.*,b.name as industry_name FROM (SELECT a.*,b.name as work_type_name FROM exam_train_material as a LEFT JOIN sys_work_type as b on a.work_type=b.id WHERE a.id IN
#{id} )as a LEFT JOIN sys_industry as b on a.industry=b.id
